TopicTitle: Free KSP to the winner of a design contest! Or SE or $25, winner's choice!

Articles.Content:
Can't see youtube on office machine. Spaceship design contest? Can we get a text dump of the contest?

If I compete and already have KSP, can I mandate that the game be given to some youngster? Preferably, one I haven't yet had to chase off my lawn?

Can't see youtube on office machine. Spaceship design contest? Can we get a text dump of the contest?

Not my contest, but some sort of youtube channel artwork for his channel about cars and bikes.

Cars, dirt bikes AND video games.

During the last week or so, I have been tirelessly working to separate the video games section of my channel, from the sponsored dirt bikes & automotives sections. I have finished three new title animations, and have created a new ending animation. However, the new channel art that I slapped together is crap, and I really need some professional help on getting it done. Therefore, I am offering a free copy of Kerbal Space Program -or- Space Engineers, gifted through Steam (or $25 via paypal), to the person that creates the most awesome channel art & icon that clearly displays what my channel is all about.

Guidelines, Templates, Old Channel Art, Etc...

\/ \/ \/ \/ \/

The deadline is 10:00pm CST on Sunday, April 13th, 2014

/\ /\ /\ /\ /\

Rules:

- You must be a subscriber to my youtube channel

- All the artwork used must be license-free or 100% original

- The final submission files must be in .xcf (GIMP) format

- The final submission must also be two .png files that are each under 2Mb for direct upload to youtube

- The final submission must be emailed to x with the subject "Channel Art Submission (your steam username) (your first name)", and include all four files individually attached to the e-mail

- Multiple submissions will be rejected, unless you are specifically submitting an update, and say so in the subject line and description

- The final submission must meet YouTube's guidelines for minimum safe viewing area, while still giving extra "eye-candy" for larger screens (this template is included in the download file)

- Upon transfer of the chosen video game (or paypal payment) via a Steam gift, the winning artwork(s) will become my sole property and may only be used/reproduced with permission (just to be safe since my channel is monetized)

- All submissions will be shown on a video (maybe), and therefore must be submitted with the understanding that they will be publicly displayed (with credit given to the author's name)

Suggestions:

- as you can tell, I prefer red & black

- I also prefer the "28 Days Later" font from dafont.com

- horsepower, speed, adrenalin, aggression

- dirt bikes & automotives depicted as "opposite" from video games

- pay close attention to my three new title animations

- etc etc etc

BE CREATIVE AND GOOD LUCK!!!

Cheaters will be disqualified.

Edited December 29, 2017 by MotoRider42HC
